# Template

View:

- [Component Template](template/tem.md)
- [Test Template](template/tem.spec.md)

Master:

Use `cm.sh`

From root project run `bash`

```sh
bash cm.sh nameComponent
```

Example:

```sh
bash cm.sh text
```

Result: create folder `Text` in `src`

```
root
  - src/
    - Text/
      - Text.js
      - Text.spec.js
```
